investigation.title: Transcription profiling of atm mutant, adm mutant and wild type whole plants and roots of Arabidopsis after gamma ray irradiation in a time series
investigation.description: Whole seedlings of wild type (4d) and atm mutants (4d) have been analyzed after a gamma ray irradiation of 0.75h, 1.5h, 3h and 5h (time course). Roots of wt (4d), atm (3d) and atr (4d) mutants have been analyzed after a 1h irradiation.
factors: Time of Sample Collection After Treatment
